SEARCH
Module net.cnoga.paint
Package net.cnoga.paint.core.tool

Class PaintTools

java.lang.Object
net.cnoga.paint.core.tool.PaintTools
public final class PaintTools extends Object
Utility class providing access to all built-in paint tools.

This class registers and exposes the application's core tools, including BrushTool, LineTool, and PanTool.
